customchoice.xy9_109.puzzleoftime.button: Play 1: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.
Play 2: Put 2 cards from your discard pile into your hand.
customchoice.xy9_27.blastgeyser: Would you like to discard the top 2 cards of your deck? If you do, this attack does 20 more damage for each {W} Energy attached to this Pokémon.
customchoice.xy9_40.moonlightslash: Would you like to return a {W} Energy from this Pokémon to your hand? If you do, this attack does 20 more damage.
playmat.prompt.chooseanenergytoattach: Choose an Energy card to attach to 1 of your Pokémon.
playmat.prompt.chooseevolutionforplay: Choose a Pokémon that evolves from this Pokémon to put onto this Pokémon.
playmat.prompt.choosetrainerforhand: Choose a Trainer card to put into your hand.
playmat.prompt.discardstadiuminplay: Choose the Stadium card to discard it, or select Done to leave the Stadium in play.
playmat.prompt.singlecardonbottomofdeck: Choose a card to put on the bottom of your deck.
playmat.prompt.xy9_102.maxelixir: Choose a basic Energy to attach to one of your Basic Pokémon on your Bench.
playmat.prompt.xy9_108.psychicsthirdeye: Choose any number of cards to discard. You'll draw that many cards.
playmat.prompt.xy9_26.stormyseas: Choose {W} Energy cards to attach to Gyarados-EX. You can choose 1 Energy card for each heads you flipped.
playmat.prompt.xy9_31.aquaturbo: Choose 2 {W} Energy cards to attach to one of your Benched Pokémon.
playmat.prompt.xy9_35.siphonoff: Choose 3 Energy cards to attach to Seismitoad.
playmat.prompt.xy9_39.waterduplicates: Choose up to 3 Frogadier to put onto your Bench.
playmat.prompt.xy9_41.giantwatershuriken: Choose an opposing Pokémon to put 6 damage counters on.
playmat.prompt.xy9_5.bughunch: Choose up to 3 {G} Pokémon to put into your hand.
playmat.prompt.xy9_59.energypresent: Attach up to 2 Energy cards to one of your Benched Pokémon.
playmat.prompt.xy9_62.megatonslash: Choose 2 opposing Benched Pokémon to damage.
playmat.prompt.xy9_73.rollup: Choose cards for your opponent to discard. You can choose 1 card for each heads you flipped.
playmat.prompt.xy9_83.mightywind: Attach an Energy card from your hand to a Benched Pokémon, or select Done.
specialvisualizations.damageunaffectedby: Damage from this Pokémon's attacks is not affected by any effects on the opposing Active Pokémon.
specialvisualizations.immunetoattackeffe: This Pokémon is immune to effects from attacks, including damage.
specialvisualizations.noabilitiesthistur: This Pokémon has no Abilities this turn.
specialvisualizations.noretreatcost: This Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.
specialvisualizations.xy9_67.watchandlea: This Pokémon's attack is replaced by the attack used during the opponent's last turn.
specialvisualizations.xy9_8.boohoo: If an Energy card is attached to this Pokémon, it will be Asleep.
specialvisualizations.xy9_82.moonbarrier: This Pokémon is immune to all effects of attacks from {N} Pokémon, including damage.
